title: Please help I just want to play the game
body: So my launcher is telling me I am not connected to the internet and yes I know there are solutions to this because I've tried all of them. Then my launcher says it's going to restore my game and patch up but it's still on 7.15 and thus has nothing to patch but it's still trying, and I am still unable to log in! Does anyone know how to fix this issue?

replies.body: Sounds like your client as a whole is just destroyed! Personally, I would suggest a clean [Reinstall of League](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/202539040). Sounds like to many files have been corrupted and the clean reinstall should repair all of those files. If you continue to have issues after you do the clean reinstall then the next step would be reaching out to our [Tech Team](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/requests/new).
